english.segment1: This is my heart's condition. This world has ammunition. To tear me down. And steal my life away
english.segment2: I know there's more than this. More than temptation's kiss. So lift me up. And give me strength to say
english.segment3: I will live. I will live for You
english.segment4: I've had the revelation. This is my declaration. More of you, oh God, and less of me
english.segment5: Cause You are my new existence. I offer no resistance. I'm running to the One I know I need
english.segment6: How could I walk away. How could I walk away. How could I walk away
english.segment7: I'll never walk away from You
